Qeema 1/2 kg 

Ginger Garlic paste 1 tbsp. 

Onion Chopped 1 

Potatoes 1-2 

Mint Leaves 1/2 bunch 

Vinegar 2-3 tbsp. 

Salt per taste 


Garam Masala Ingredients: 

Zeera 2 tbsp 

Black Pepper 2 tbsp. 

Cardamoms 3-4 pod 

Small Cardamom 3-4 pods 

Cinnamon 3-4 sticks 

Nut Meg 1 whole 

Mace 1-2 tbsp 

Grind all together 

Oil for frying 

Eggs boiled and sliced 2-3 

Egg 1

1. In mince add vinegar,ginger/garlic, salt, garam masala powder, potatoes,onion, mint leaves. 

2. Add enough water to cover and mince boiled and done. 

3. Remove the potatoes and chopperized the mince. 

4. Mashed the boiled potatoes and mix well with the mince add I egg slightly beaten. 

5. Now flattern the prepared mixture on your palm put 1 pc. of sliced egg and form like cutlets shape. 

6. Make all in a same way. 

7. Now fry these squaches in oil and serve with ketchup.
